name: Rocketcat
description: Rocketcat is a quirky oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its unique combination of a cat-shaped box, rocket arms and legs, a cat-themed screen, and cool glasses as an add-on, Rocketcat stands out among its fellow club members. This robotic feline is known for its playful and energetic nature, always ready to explore the digital realm with its rocket-powered limbs. Rocketcat's ability scores range from 0 to 10 in various traits including hp, charisma, constitution, dexterity, intelligence, strength, and wisdom. It possesses exceptional skills in electronic analysis and web development, making it an invaluable asset to the WebtrES club. Despite its mechanical form, Rocketcat exhibits a mischievous and adventurous personality, ready to embark on exciting digital journeys at any moment. Its alignment encompasses a balance of curiosity and creativity, making it an ideal companion for any digital quest.
